column5: Yesterday while doing my drive to get the wife and kids and errands I noticed all the small ponds were open.  The small lake were starting to open up and from the looks of it, everything is going to open up soon. http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/modis.cgi/modis?region=o&page=1
Its not over till the fat lady sings! My buds hauled limits of jumbos out of simcoe yesterday, so its not over yet. My boat is ready though, so bring on the softwater!!  S.
Wow, Ive been looking for a site that gave pics like that for months now. Couldn't find this one. Thanks for posting.
Ya, the melt is on, read that 2 ATV's went into the drink, one west of Georgina and another around Pefferlaw, equipment gone but nobody hurt other than ego.
Those popcorn skies are muskie weather.
I thought I sent it to you knowing you are new to Kingston, umKthxbye.  If not, sorry and cheers.
Was out on Sturgeon yesterday still about 10" of ice, A bunch of small perch but a nice day to get out.
